segment.content:
FLO Group is one of Turkey's leading shoe and accessory manufacturers and a global brand
with a wide range of products. The company carries out innovation projects aimed at
product development, production process optimization, supply chain management and
customer experience enhancement within the scope of its engineering activities. It is aimed
to continuously improve the processes by using technology and data analytics in order to
provide solutions suitable for customer needs.
During my internship, I worked as an intern in the marketing department of FLO Group. My
main activities included conducting market research, creating competitor analysis reports
and developing performance marketing strategies. In particular, I carried out studies on
customer segmentation and needs analysis. In addition, I evaluated the impact of marketing
strategies using data analysis and examined the background of successful projects. During
my internship, I had the opportunity to develop my teamwork and communication skills.
Before my internship, I expected to gain practical experience in engineering applications and
sales-marketing processes. The realized results exceeded my expectations; I had the chance
to contribute to real-life projects by experiencing team dynamics and collaboration. This
process helped me improve myself in both engineering and marketing.
During my internship, I learned the importance of data analysis, customer-centric thinking,
and effective communication skills. I also realized how critical team collaboration and
effective communication in projects are to success. This experience provided an important
foundation for me to become a more well-rounded professional in engineering and
marketing. What I learned will guide me in my future career and professional development.
2

score.feedback: Özet bölümü şirketin faaliyetlerini, stajyerin görevlerini, beklentileri ve sonuçları ile öğrenilenleri içermektedir. Şirket ve staj faaliyetleri hakkında bazı spesifik detaylar bulunmaktadır (pazar araştırması, müşteri segmentasyonu vb.). Ancak, beklentiler ve sonuçlar arasındaki sentez zayıf kalmaktadır. Öğrenilenler de belirtilmiş ancak daha derinlemesine bir analiz yapılmamıştır. Bu nedenle puan 60 olarak belirlenmiştir.
